name: CSPO vs PSPO Certifications
description: Certified Scrum Product Owner training® (CSPO) and Professional Scrum Product Owner™ (PSPO) are two popular certifications for individuals who play the role of a Product Owner in Scrum teams. The most recognized Scrum certification is Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO), with Professional Scrum Product Owner (PSPO) in second place. They are offered by different organizations ...
